mathematica: a[k_, n_] := If[k == 1, 1, If[EvenQ[n] || k < 0 || n > k, 0, If[n >= k - 1, Binomial[2*Floor[k/2], Floor[k/2]]/2, Binomial[k - 1, Floor[n/2]]]]];
